name: The Zulu
startIntroPart1: You are the first son of the powerful King Senzangakhona of Mthethwa. You have unitied all Zulu clans but more awaits you.
startIntroPart2: Keep your toes, your loyal army preceeds you and fight for honour. The ancestors approve your kingship. Dominate the others.
declaringWar: Your existence must come to an end.
attacked: You want to play with the Zulu's, Our children shall play with your skulls after our victory.
introduction: I am Shaka kaSenzangakhona. Friend to few, demise to many. May peace last between us.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: You are very lucky, normally nobody's left alive.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
